message: how do I get said pre2?
sent them an email. no reply at all. not sure what's going on

You can get a discount:
http://developer.palm.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=2129
or a free one:
http://developer.palm.com/blog/2011/02/mojo-and-enyo-two-great-opportunities/

It took 6 days before they replied. Got qualified 3 days ago, but haven't received anything just yet (as I wouldn't expect it to be that quick anyway).
feels like a very long wait till the pre3
my plus is feeling very old ;)
Just got confirmation that my free Pre 2 is on it's way...
